AssessmentItem.ItemText: Which expressions are equivalent to -3-(7.5+4)?
Which equation is true?
Round 7.49362 to the nearest thousandth.
The length of a track around a field is 1/4 miles. You jog 3 1/2 times around the track. How far do you jog?
Michael paid a total of $48 for 4 pizzas. He used a coupon for $4 off the entire order. What is the equation to determine the regular price of 1 pizza, p?
A roll of 40 quarters weighs 8 ounces. Which proportion can be used to find the weight in ounces, w, of 200 quarters?
How many seconds are in 2 hours and 2 minutes?
Use the diagram provided to answer the question. Which shape best represents the 2-dimensional shape formed by the slice made by the plane through the vertices of the cube shown?
Vincent bought a 25-pound bag of rice. He cooked 6.25 pounds of the rice. He stored the rest of the rice in 3 3/4-pound portions. What is the maximum number of 3 3/4-pound portions he stored?
Compare the quantities (2/3)x(1/4) and (1/3)x(3/4).

Ariana is playing a game. For each of her turns, she rolls a number cube labeled with the numbers 1 through 6. She also spins the spinner shown, divided equally into three parts labelled 1, 2, and 3. To win the game Ariana needs to roll a 3 and spin a 3 on her next turn. What is the probability that Ariana will win the game on her next turn?
What is the greatest common factor for 12 and 30?
In Ms. Morales’s class, the ratio of boys to girls is 3:7. The class sizes at Ms. Morales’s school range from 22 to 34 students per class. What is the total number of students in Ms. Morales’s class?
The sale price of an item on sale for 40% off is $48. What was the regular price?
Angles F and G are complementary angles. Angles G and H are supplementary angles. The degree measure of each angle is a whole number. What is the smallest possible measure of angle H?
In a game, Janeesa started with 0 points. She then earned 50 points, lost 80 points, and earned 10 points. Which number line shows Janeesa’s ending score in the game?
A one-quart container of oil costs $0.89. A case of 12 one-quart containers costs $8.64. How much is saved per container by buying the oil by the case?

Last year Jan had 25 model airplanes in her collection. This year she has 32% more model airplanes. Jan then gave her brother 6 model airplanes to start a collection. How many model airplanes does Jan have after she gave 6 to her brother?
Megan uses 2/3 cup of almonds to make 4 cups of trail mix. Using this same proportion, how many cups of almonds would Megan need to make 9 cups of trail mix?
The scale on a map shows that 5 centimeters = 2 kilometers. What number of centimeters on the map represents an actual distance of 5 kilometers?
Victoria folded 56 paper cranes in 6 hours. Daimon folded paper cranes at the same rate as Victoria. Which graph could model the rate at which Daimon folded paper cranes?
